property.name: hibernateProperties
property.value:
hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5Dialect hibernate.connection.useUnicode=true hibernate.connection.characterEncoding=UTF-8 hibernate.connection.charSet=UTF-8 hibernate.ejb.naming_strategy=org.hibernate.cfg.ImprovedNamingStrategy hibernate.show_sql=true hibernate.generate_statistics=true
hibernate.c3p0.min_size=20 hibernate.c3p0.max_size=40 hibernate.c3p0.timeout=300 hibernate.c3p0.max_statements=50 hibernate.c3p0.idle_test_period=3000
